price: ពួកគេតបវិញថាៈ តើអ្នកនាំមកឱ្យយើងនូវការពិត ឬមួយ អ្នកជាមនុស្សម្នាក់ក្នុងចំណោមពួកដែលនិយាយលេងសើច?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
